Translations.Text: Hav ili est pacient gxis vi ven them gxi est put por them! DI est Forgiver Merciful
O vi kred wicked ul brings any news vi vi 1 investigate lest vi commit injustice kelk popol ignorance tiam igx sorry remorseful ki vi done

Kaj kon ti di messenger ven your midst! Hav li auxskult al vi many ajx vi far ajx difficult yourselves! Di far vi am faith ornam gxi your kor Li far vi abhor disbelief wickedness disobedience. These direkt unu
Such est grace DI His blessings. DI est Omniscient SAGX

grup believers batal each ali vi reconcile them. 1 grup aggresses ali vi batal aggressing grup gxis ili submit di ordon! Once ili submit vi reconcile 2 grup equitably. Vi argument justice DI am those est just
believers est members de 1 famili; vi keep pac within your famili reverence DI ke vi ating mercy

O vi ne kred popol ridicule ali popol ili est put than ili! Nor shall any women ridicule ali women ili est put than ili. Nor shall vi mok unu another far fun da your nom. Evil ja est reversion al wickedness post ating faith! Anyone ne pent this these est transgressors
